QUORUM.description: How many units are required to hold a planet.

body.data: You need X number of units to meet quorum requirements.
Income is distributed at the beginning of each turn. Each planet occupied by a faction

HELP-SYNTAX.description: Guide to understanding integrating help service syntax.

body.data:
Argument Format:

Non-optional arguments are surrounded by angle brackets '<>'. Optional arguments are surrounded by parenthesis '()'.

Data Format:

Cells are specified in square brackets, with q and r separated by a comma, like so '[4, -3]'. Lists of cells are surrounded by a second set of brackets and also separated by commas, like so '[[4, -3], [12, 0]]'.
